lead_paragraph: The Potash Corporation’s battle against BHP Billiton’s hostile takeover bears a striking resemblance to the one that Cadbury unsuccessfully waged against Kraft Foods.
snippet: The Potash Corporation’s battle against BHP Billiton’s hostile takeover bears a striking resemblance to the one that Cadbury unsuccessfully waged against Kraft Foods.

headline.main: Potash’s Fight Against Takeover Resembles Cadbury’s
headline.seo: Potash’s Fight Against Takeover Resembles Cadbury’s
headline.print_headline: One Road Map Of a Hostile Bid

byline.original: By ROB COX, ANTONY CURRIE and NICHOLAS PAISNER
